alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sedgwick (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 4:46PM MDT until June 07 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LOGAN AND WESTERN SEDGWICK COUNTIES... At 445 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Lodgepole, or 11 miles west of Chappell, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Julesburg, Ovid and Sedgwick. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
